name: level 1 - Aston University (Chapter 1)
description: You must infiltrate the Aston University and bring down their reign of terror!

name: level 2 - Capgeminini Aston (Chapter 1)
description: You have moved on to the next stage of your journey, you are now a Capgemini employee and you must rise to the top of the Aston office to get your name heard!
